Code: EXEC SQL SELECT char(dtvencto, local), bcocobr, agecobr, sum(valcredr) FROM seguros.v0histnotcre WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND nrendosc = :NRENDOSC AND nrparcelc = :NRPARCELC AND nrendosr = :NRRENDOSR AND nrparcelr = :NRPARCELR AND operacao = :OPERACAO GROUP BY dtvencto, bcoCobr, agecobr END SQL
